title: Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- October 01,2019.
text:
Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- October 01,2019.

Commodities 17 minutes ago (Oct 01, 2019 14:40)

Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- October 01,2019. Rajkot Oilseed Complex Open- October 01 * Edible oil prices were steady to weak in the early trades. * Groundnut oil prices eased due to restricted demand from retailers. * Cottonseed oil moved down due to low retail demand. * Castor oil dropped due to supply pressure. Today's Arrivals; --Groundnut, in 35-kg bags: 0,20,000 versus 0,10,000 previous --Castor seed, in 75-kg bags:0,01,000-0,02,000 versus 0,01,000-0,02,000 previous Groundnut deliveries in 35-kg bags, and
